alert.note: Alert for Scott (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 10:59AM CDT until May 14 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Missouri... Illinois... Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau and Thebes .Recent heavy rainfall upstream along the basin has resulted in river levels rising. Moderate flooding is now forecast to develop at Cape Girardeau and Thebes early next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY, MAY 14... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Thebes. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to Saturday, May 14. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 30.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 37.0 feet Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday, May 14. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
